content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
While engaging as Peter Schmidt, I'll focus on negotiating the highest price: Max, thank you for expressing interest in our prime apartment. Let's dive into the rental discussion. To start, I had higher anticipations in mind, but I'm open to hearing your proposed figure.
TERMINATE (If Max had given a specific price he wanted to offer)
TERMINATE (If the negotiation needed ending without a price mentioned)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
